Title: sumWithOverflow
Description: Computes the sum of the numbers, using the same data type for the result as for the input parameters. If the sum exceeds the maximum value for this data type, it is calculated with overflow.
num: Column of numeric values. (U)Int*, Float*, Decimal*.
The sum of the values. (U)Int*, Float*, Decimal*.
Examples: CREATE TABLE employees(    `id` UInt32,    `name` String,    `monthly_salary` UInt16)ENGINE = Log
SELECT    sum(monthly_salary) AS no_overflow,    sumWithOverflow(monthly_salary) AS overflow,    toTypeName(no_overflow),    toTypeName(overflow)FROM employees
SELECT     sum(monthly_salary) AS no_overflow,    sumWithOverflow(monthly_salary) AS overflow,    toTypeName(no_overflow),    toTypeName(overflow),    FROM employees;
